text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.title: §4§lChromaAnvils Config
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Anvi:
§4What does this do?
§7This determines how many characters you can type to anvils text filed
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Name: Name Limit

§4What does this do?
§7This determines how many characters you can have in the final name
excluding the color/style tags
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Blac:
§4What does this do?
§7This allows you to blacklist what items
can not have colored names!

§7Example: §cminecraft:name_tag
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Pres:
§4What does this do?
§7As the name says enables presets

§4What are Presets?
§7Presets are a feature that makes handling long names with many tags easier.
For example, you can have a preset like "<tag1>",
and when you type that in the name field,
it will be replaced with something like "<red>this <green>is <blue>tag1".

§4Whats this for?
§7This is the name part of the tag

§4Whats this for?
§7This is the content part of the tag
